tool.name: bcftools @EXECUTABLE@
tool.description: HMM model for detecting runs of autozygosity.
tool.command:
bcftools @EXECUTABLE@
## Default section #if $sec_default.AF_tag: --AF-tag "${sec_default.AF_tag}" #end if #if $sec_default.AF_file: --AF-file "${sec_default.AF_file}" #end if #if $sec_default.estimate_AF: --estimate-AF "${sec_default.estimate_AF}" #end if #if $sec_default.GTs_only: --GTs-only "${sec_default.GTs_only}" #end if ${sec_default.skip_indels} #if $sec_default.genetic_map: --genetic-map "${sec_default.genetic_map}" #end if #if $sec_default.rec_rate: --rec-rate "${sec_default.rec_rate}" #end if #set values_sec_default_regions = '","'.join([str($value) for $value in $sec_default.regions_repeat]) #if $values_sec_default_regions: --regions "${values_sec_default_regions}" #end if #if $sec_default.regions_file: --regions-file "${sec_default.regions_file}" #end if #if $sec_default.sample: --sample "${sec_default.sample}" #end if #set values_sec_default_targets = '","'.join([str($value) for $value in $sec_default.targets_repeat]) #if $values_sec_default_targets: --targets "${values_sec_default_targets}" #end if #if $sec_default.targets_file: --targets-file "${sec_default.targets_file}" #end if #if $sec_default.hw_to_az: --hw-to-az "${sec_default.hw_to_az}" #end if #if $sec_default.az_to_hw: --az-to-hw "${sec_default.az_to_hw}" #end if ${sec_default.viterbi_training}
## Primary Input/Outputs
$input_file > $output_file

param.help: calculate AC,AN counts on the fly, using either all samples ("-") or samples listed in <file>
param.label: Estimate Af
param.name: estimate_AF

param.help: use GTs, ignore PLs, use <float> for PL of unseen genotypes. Safe value to use is 30 to account for GT errors.
param.label: Gts Only
param.name: GTs_only

param.help: skip indels as their genotypes are enriched for errors
param.label: Skip Indels
param.name: skip_indels

param.help: genetic map in IMPUTE2 format, single file or mask, where string "{CHROM}" is replaced with chromosome name
param.label: Genetic Map
param.name: genetic_map

param.help: P(AZ|HW) transition probability from AZ (autozygous) to HW (Hardy-Weinberg) state
param.label: Hw To Az
param.name: hw_to_az

param.help: P(HW|AZ) transition probability from HW to AZ state
param.label: Az To Hw
param.name: az_to_hw

param.help: perform Viterbi training to estimate transition probabilities
param.label: Viterbi Training
param.name: viterbi_training

tool.help: HMM model for detecting runs of autozygosity.
